name: Bombs Away! (YelloeJ)
description:
An explosive and chaotic arcade game where you defeat enemies with their own bombs! Keep their bombs from destroying your base by throwing them at enemies.

Credits:

-made for BenBonk Game Jam #4, with the theme "Keep it away"

-color palette: mist gba by Kerrie Lake

-music used: Technocracy by TipTopTomCat
